item.author: Author
item.description: Use nohup to run background process(es) uninterruptedly even when going offline in a remote SSH session.

item.title: Asus USB Wifi
item.author: Author
item.description: The wifi chip in ASUS USB N10 Nano (B1) is Realtek 8188EUS1 and it works on Linux 5.9, but not Linux 5.10 or later.

item.title: Pacman and the Arch User Repository (AUR)
item.author: Author
item.description: The Arch User Repository (AUR) hosts PKGBUILDs (instructions to download and build a package) contributed by the community. Similar to Ubuntu PPAs, but on steriod.
